snippet.title: Block Strategy Roguelite Teaser
snippet.description:
Block Strategy is an RTS Base Defence game with a fully destructible world. Build your base and find fuel to power your reactor before you're overrun by an onslaught of enemy robots.

The demo can be downloaded now on Steam at the following link: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2642070/Block_Strategy/

Block Strategy is due to be released in Q3 2024 and will be appearing at Steam Next Fest June 2024.
